Normal ending citation [@Petersen2015a].

Abnormally operating brackets [@Petersen2015][^1].

[^1]: This footnote is directly adjacent

Brackets resolve when spacing introduced [@Petersen2015] [^2].

[^2]: This footnote follows a space

Unbracketed citations seem to operate normally, such as @Sjoegren2005[^3]

[^3]: Footnote adjacent to alphanumeric character rather than bracket
